title: Encountered a "freshend type" with id 0 but our counter is only at 0

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
Attempting to compile the following with my [`eclectic`](https://github.com/apasel422/eclectic) crate yields an ICE:

``` rust
extern crate eclectic;

use eclectic::*;
use std::collections::HashMap;

fn main() {
    let mut m = Box::new(HashMap::new()) as Box<Map<Key = u32, Value = u16, MapValue = u16>>;
}
```

Output from `rustc 1.2.0-nightly (613e57b44 2015-06-01) (built 2015-06-02)`

```
error: internal compiler error: Encountered a freshend type with id 0 but our counter is only at 0
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports
```
